CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing EchoWave relative to AetherNet?
SRP.A: EchoWave is {above} AetherNet in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing OracleFeed relative to EchoWave?
SRP.A: OracleFeed is {below} EchoWave in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Luminara relative to NovaStream?
SRP.A: Luminara is {below} NovaStream in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total daily active users?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Starburst Online}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total daily active users?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {OracleFeed}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is AetherNet's minimum Daily Active Users in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: AetherNet's minimum Daily Active Users is in {2002}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is OracleFeed's minimum Daily Active Users in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: OracleFeed's minimum Daily Active Users is in {1996}.

NC.Q: Between 1999 and 2007, did the total Daily Active Users experience a larger or smaller change than between 1994 and 2008?
NC.A: The change in total daily active users between 1999 and 2007 was {smaller} than between 1994 and 2008.

NC.Q: Was the total Daily Active Users in 2004 higher or lower than in 2012?
NC.A: The total daily active users in 2004 was {lower} than in 2012.

NC.Q: Between 2005 and 2006, was the average total Daily Active Users higher or lower than between 1989 and 1993?
NC.A: The average total daily active users between 2005 and 2006 was {higher} than between 1989 and 1993.

NC.Q: Between 2004 and 2012, did the total Daily Active Users experience a larger or smaller change than between 1996 and 2015?
NC.A: The change in total daily active users between 2004 and 2012 was {smaller} than between 1996 and 2015.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Starburst Online} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did AetherNet and EchoWave first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: AetherNet and EchoWave first exchanged leading positions in {1989}.
